data.title: Logistics Manager
data.description: Logistics manager oversee the movement, distribution and warehousing in an organization. He controls the flow of incoming jobs and outgoing ones to ensure customers receive goods on time. Logistics managers oversee inventory control, material handling, customer service, transportation and planning workers. Managers prepare worker schedules and ensure warehousing workers follows the rules adequately. The manager prepares reports for upper managements and work to improve the efficiency of the company’s efficiency.

data.title: Accountant
data.description: An account officer manages the financial bookkeeping of a business. Each day an Account Officer Processes invoice, records payments and track expenses of the organization. Expense must be crosschecked with the corresponding invoice, to ensure that the billing is accurate. Communication with customers is a regular duty of this job. Interacts with collection agencies on past-due accounts and works to resolve billing disputes, create and monitor internal auditing procedures and to solve problem when accounting numbers are not in sync.

data.title: Production Supervisor
data.description: The production supervisor position is responsible for supervising employees in a production and packaging environment. This position plans and assigns work, implements policies and procedures and recommends improvements in production methods, equipment, operating procedures and working conditions. The Production Supervisor is to oversee the production operations. He / She will guarantee that operations remain a smooth and efficient process by monitoring employees and organizing workflows. In a fast-paced environment like production, the supervisor is an integral part of the manufacturing process. They must be competent and comprehend complex operations. He / She should also be able to optimize day-to-day activities while minimizing the costs. The goal is to ensure that the production processes deliver products of maximum quality in a profitable manner.

data.title: Business Analyst
data.description: IBFCAlliance Limited - Between 1992 and 1999, the business known as IBFCAgusto Training Limited, was carried out in the training divisions of two companies. In1999, it became a joint venture training business, and was later incorporated into a limited liability company (IBFCAgusto Training Limited) in 2001. Effective 1st of July 2014, consequent upon a business restructuring exercise, IBFCAgusto Training Ltd and Alliance Consulting (one of its owner firms) combined their businesses to form IBFCAlliance Limited. Over the years, the company has provided bespoke training courses and seminars in the Nigerian market and beyond.

data.title: MARKETING AND COMMUNICATIONS MANAGER
data.description: We are looking to hire a Marketing and Communications Manager who will be in charge of overseeing the promotion of our company's brand. As a successful hire, you will be responsible for developing pricing strategies, identifying new customers and opportunities, public relation and communication, supporting lead generation efforts, and creating promotions with our operations manager. You will also be tasked with developing budgets and expenditures, as well as ROI strategies with objective KPI’s. Finally, you will be in charge of developing and managing our company's advertising campaigns.

data.title: BLVD LOUNGE MANAGER
data.description: We are looking for an experienced and passionate Lounge and Bar (shop) Manager to join our team. As a shop manager, you will overtake a variety of responsibilities and duties such as restaurant marketing strategies, recruiting and hiring staff, training, overseeing food and beverage quality, developing menus as well as greeting and serving restaurant guests.

data.title: Accountant
data.description: We are looking for an experienced and passionate Lounge and Bar Account Manager to join our team. As an Accountant, you will Oversee Bookkeeping; Accounts Receivable and Payable; Bank Transactions and other banking activities; VAT and PAYE; Cashier; Payroll; Receiving and Procurement.

data.title: Business Manager
data.description: We are looking for any one who is experienced and can play the role of a Business Manager to lead the work of employees in our company. She will be responsible for ensuring the efficiency of business operations as well as setting strategic goals for the future. The ideal candidate will be well-versed in all matters business. They will be a competent leader able to provide guidance that enhances performance in a manner which incorporates the company’s vision and culture. The goal will be to ensure the profitability of our company’s activities to drive sustainable development and long-term success.
